verbose_text: Trans-10, cis-12 CLA reduces lipogenesis by decreasing expression of SREBP-1c and PPAR-gamma and their downstream genes, ACC, FASN, and SCD1, reduces glucose and FA uptake by reducing GLUT4 and LPL expression, increases FA oxidation by increasing CPT1 and UCP2 expression and reduces adipocyte proliferation and differentiation by reducing PPAR-gammaand its downstream genes [XREF_BIBR].
